mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM carts WHERE user_id = #{user_id})

SELECT ci.cart_item_id, p.product_id, p.product_title, p.stitle, p.writer, p.publisher, p.content, p.page, p.price, p.languages, p.stock, p.product_image, ci.quantity FROM carts c JOIN cart_items ci ON c.cart_id = ci.cart_id JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE cart_id = #{cart_id} AND product_id = #{product_id}
